import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import QuestionsDetails from './QuestionsDetails' import Avatar from '../../components/Avatar/Avatar' const DisplayAnswers = ({question}) => { return (
{ question.answer.map((ans) =>(

{ans.answerBody}

answered {ans.answeredOn}

{question.userPosted.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}
{question.userPosted}
)) }
) } export default DisplayAnswers
